name: he0

body.origin:
|- whe(c0, emptycls)
-| wss(cima(c0, emptycls), emptycls)
-| wb(whe(c0, emptycls), wss(cima(c0, emptycls), emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- whe(c0, emptycls)
-| wss(cima(c0, emptycls), emptycls)
-| wb(whe(c0, emptycls), wss(cima(c0, emptycls), emptycls))

body.origin:
|- wss(cima(c0, emptycls), emptycls)
-| wceq(cima(c0, emptycls), emptycls)

cumulated.origin:
|- whe(c0, emptycls)
-| wb(whe(c0, emptycls), wss(cima(c0, emptycls), emptycls))
-| wceq(cima(c0, emptycls), emptycls)

|- whe(c0, emptycls)
-| wb(whe(c0, emptycls), wss(cima(c0, emptycls), emptycls))

comment: Any relation is hereditary in the empty set. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)
